-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | library for takahashi method.
--   
@package reasonable-operational
@version 0.1.0.1

module Control.Monad.Operational
data CoYoneda f x
CoYoneda :: (b -> x) -> f b -> CoYoneda f x
liftCoYoneda :: f a -> CoYoneda f a
data Free f r
Free :: (f (Free f r)) -> Free f r
Pure :: r -> Free f r
liftF :: Functor f => f r -> Free f r
newtype Program f a
Program :: Free (CoYoneda f) a -> Program f a
toFree :: Program f a -> Free (CoYoneda f) a
singleton :: f a -> Program f a
interpret :: Monad m => (forall a. instr a -> m a) -> Program instr b -> m b
instance Monad (Program f)
instance Applicative (Program f)
instance Functor (Program f)
instance Functor f => Monad (Free f)
instance Functor f => Applicative (Free f)
instance Functor f => Functor (Free f)
instance Functor (CoYoneda f)
